column1: ශ්‍රී ලංකාව සඳහා සාමාන්‍යය කාලගුණ අන්‍ාවැකිය
GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR SRI LANKA
ජාතික කාලගුණ විදයා මධ්‍යස්ථානහේ, අනාවැකි අංශය මගින් නිකුත් කරන ලදි

column2: ඉදිරි පැය 24 ට දිවයින්‍ වටා වන්‍ මුහුදු ප්‍රලේශ්‍ සඳහා කාලගුණ අන්‍ාවැකිය

column2: WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS

column1: Issued at 05.30 a.m. 06 June 2024
Condition of Rain:

column2: Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places in the sea areas off the coast extending

column1:
from  Kankasanthurai 
to  Hambantota

column2: thundershowers may occur at a few places in the other sea areas around the island.

Winds will be south-westerly and wind speed will be (25-35) kmph.

from Mullaitivu to Puttalam via Kankasanthurai, Mannar and from Hambantota to Pottuvil.

column1: State of Sea:

column2: The sea areas off the coasts extending from Mullaitivu to Puttalam via Kankasanthurai, Mannar,

column1: and from Hambantota to Pottuvil can be rough at times.

aval and fishing communities are also requested to be attentive in this regard.
